about.services.paragraph: At Max Vision Auto Detailing, in Argyroupoli, Athens, we're all about making your car look brand new again. We offer expert cleaning, polishing, and protective coatings to give your vehicle that showroom shine. Whether you want to refresh your ride or keep it looking its best, we've got you covered with top-notch service and results you'll love.
labocosmetica.installer.paragraph: MaxVision Car Detail is a certified installer of Labocosmetica.We have the exclusivity to protect your car with the best ceramic coating on the market today! This glass coating has a lifespan of 2 to 3 years, provides an extreme shine and is extremely dirt and water repellent!
follow.us.paragraph.1: Follow us on social media and stay up-to-date with our latest projects, promotions and so much more! We also have a
follow.us.paragraph.2: where we upload new videos of our auto detailing treatments every week.
